DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate clinical performance two daily disposable contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Comparison Two Daily Disposable Contact Lenses .
DOC.criteria: Age : 18 year 45 year Current daily soft contact lens habitual optical correction : Refraction : Best sphere ( correct back vertex distance ) 1.00 6.00D Cylinder 0.00 0.75D Best spectacle correct visual acuity 6/9 good eye Willingness adhere instruction set clinical protocol Signature subject inform consent form Systemic ocular allergy might interfere contact lens wear Systemic disease might interfere contact lens wear Ocular disease might interfere contact lens wear ( e.g . hypoesthesia , insufficient lacrimal secretion ) Use medication might interfere contact lens wear Active ocular infection Use ocular medication Significant ocular anomaly Presence two corneal scar either eye Pregnancy lactation Any medical condition might prejudicial study Participated clinical study past month Currently wear monovision
